attributes.action: Stop Sharia Law from being enshrined in British legal system
attributes.additional_details:
Lawyers get guidelines on drawing up documents according to Islamic rules to enshrine Sharia Law into British legal system.

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2587215/Sharia-Law-enshrined-British-legal-lawyers-guidelines-drawing-documents-according-Islamic-rules.html

The Government must stop this.

This is Britain and we have British laws we don't need any others.

The UK has the most comprehensive equality laws in the world, yet the Law Society seems determined to undermine this by giving approval to a system that relegates women, non-Muslim and children born out of wedlock to second class citizenship.
